name: inconsiderately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows someone does not think or worry about other people or their feelings: People often drive carelessly and inconsiderately. The university authorities had inconsiderately scheduled exams at the height of the tennis season. See
inconsiderate
More examplesFewer examplesWatch out for vehicles inconsiderately parked in the sharp bend up the road.He inconsiderately told the director to drop what he was doing and come to Hollywood immediately. Every day, parents waiting to pick up their children inconsiderately block the road.
